title: FB Live: Other People's Opinions
itunes:title: FB Live: Other People's Opinions
description:
Get the Free Course here:
http://phit.click/freecourse
 
My thoughts on what other people think of you. We can't let that stop us during this time.
I share some resources I'm reading and studying and four things to do right now.
 
Resources:
Straight Up with Trent Shelton:
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/straight-up-with-trent-shelton/id1489061681
 
Layla F Shaad:
http://laylafsaad.com/meandwhitesupremacy
 
Four steps: Get aware of your thinking, educate yourself on new things, question what you believe, do something.
 
And I answer some questions on how to talk to kids who are confused and scared right now.
